title.jp: Kami ka Akuma ka!? Jigoku ni Arawareta Saikyou no Otoko

synopsis: It's the year 199x, and the world is enveloped in the fires of a nuclear holocaust.

title.jp: The Fist of Lingering Regret and Certain Death!

synopsis: The rice seeds which an old man had been traveling with for half a year to bring back to his village are stolen from him.

title.jp: In the City Without Light, a Lone Fist Burns!

synopsis: Kenshiro’s arch nemesis Shin who calls himself King Clan has captured Lin who was following Kenshiro.

title.jp: Attack the Bloody Cross! The Secret Technique, Death by Soft Strikes!

synopsis: Kenshiro has killed Shin's subordinates.

title.jp: Can the Flames of Love Burn in Hell? You Don't Even Know You're Already Dead!

synopsis: Shin is a user of the Divine Fist of the South Star, the Assassin’s Fist which contests the Divine Fist of the North Star.

title.jp: The Devil's Hit List. Find the Man with the 7 Scars!

synopsis: Kenshiro, Lin, and Bat arrive at a desert oasis.

title.jp: Villains! How About Counting Down to Your Own Death?!

synopsis: The new leader of God's Army takes the people of the town hostage to lure Kenshiro.

title.jp: Strike the Hidden Power Point! There's No Requiem for the Wicked

synopsis: In his search for the leader of God's Army (The Colonel) Kenshiro enters the soaring tower within the base.

title.jp: Villains! Finish Your Prayers Before You Die!

synopsis: In exchange for access to the lake, a witch named Patora demands village people work as slaves.

title.jp: Inverse Raging Fire Punch! There Are Too Many Who Deserve to Die!

synopsis: Pastora and Dragon are controlling the lake’s water and afflict the village people.

title.jp: Villains! Listen to the Blues of Hell!

synopsis: Kenshiro returns water to the well, as Toyo who is Bat’s foster parent, wishes.

title.jp: I Am Death Itself! I'll Chase You to the Ends of Hell!

synopsis: In order to avenge Toyo, who dies protecting the children of the village, Kenshiro chases Jackal.

title.jp: Arhat Deva Fist! Once Released, There's No Stopping It!

synopsis: Joker takes away Jackal and orders to restrain Devil’s Rebirth.

title.jp: A Miserable Era! The Good Die So Young!

synopsis: Duran gains the trust of the villagers and is living among them, he actually held a candle to the devil with Dante before.

title.jp: Try Counting to Three! You're the One To Die!

synopsis: Kenshiro and his gang arrive in a town with a haunting sound of an ominous bell.

title.jp: Villains, Want to Try Singing? Hell's Counting Rhyme!

synopsis: A boy named Sera tells Kenshiro about suffering villagers caught in the middle of a power struggle.

title.jp: A Man Lives to Fight! The Door to the Showdown Opens!

synopsis: Shin gathers his entire elite King Army in order to consolidate his power to defeat Kenshiro.

title.jp: Life of Death!? Beyond the Wasteland Lie the First Avenue of Hell!

synopsis: The fully assembled King Army assaults a village Ken was visiting.

title.jp: Villains! Have Your One-Way Ticket to Death!

synopsis: Garekki and Goldwolf attack Jennifer’s village.

title.jp: A Nightmare Battle! My Fist is a Million Volts!

synopsis: With the information Temjina sacrificed his life to give, Kenshiro and the others head for Southern Cross.

title.jp: The Evil Palace Aflame! One Last Step to Shin!

synopsis: Shin’s creation, Southern Cross, is thrust into chaos by Balcom’s rebellion.

title.jp: Conclusion of Part One: Yuria Forever… and Shin!

synopsis: Kenshiro finally confronts his old nemesis, Shin.

title.jp: The Tumultuous Dragon and Tiger! Only Battles Waits for Me?!

synopsis: Kenshiro and the others leave Southern Cross behind.

title.jp: Sinners! Thy Name is Fang Clan!!

synopsis: Mamiya’s brother Kou is attacked by the Fang Clan and publicly executed.

title.jp: Tremble as You Sleep! Villains in the Valley of Night Mist!

synopsis: Kenshiro and Rei, North Star and South Star, set out to exterminate the Fang Clan.

title.jp: Only the Evil Laugh! I Can't Stand the World We Live In!!

synopsis: The Boss Fang shows his trump card.

title.jp: Rei! I'll Catch Your Tears With My Fist!!

synopsis: To rescue Airi, Mamiya heads to meet the Boss Fang.

title.jp: Too Late to Beg for Mercy! Go to Hell, Emperor Fang!

synopsis: Kenshiro tells Rei about the seven scars on his chest.

title.jp: Destiny Looms Near! Jagi, Who Are You?

synopsis: One man has been calling himself Kenshiro and perpetuating acts of cruelty.

title.jp: The Iron Mask from Hell! The Fiend Who Calls Himself

synopsis: The feeble Mako and his younger brother Aki live in a town under Jagi’s control.

title.jp: Four Strikes of Fury! Jagi, Wait For Me In Hell!!

synopsis: Jagi chooses the roof of a 200 meter-tall building for the site of his showdown.

title.jp: This is the Village of Miracles! A Fallen Angel Has Arrived!

synopsis: Word has it that Toki is a demon.

title.jp: Toki, Are You an Angel or a Devil?!

synopsis: Kenshiro enters the village of miracle.

title.jp: The Evil One! Toki, Your Heart is Completely Rotten!!

synopsis: Yu, part of the caravan that picked Lin up, has fallen ill.

title.jp: Don't Look Back! Hate Only Evil and Strike Toki!!

synopsis: Kenshiro finally faces off against Toki.

title.jp: Love, I Reject! For I Bear the Cursed Star of Death!!

synopsis: Bathed in the ashes of death, Toki gives up his position as successor.

title.jp: Crimson Orchid Mountain Fist! A Birth of a Tragic Woman!!

synopsis: The warden Uighur has guessed that Kenshiro cannot kill women.

title.jp: A Heinous Legacy! The Gate to Cassandra Has Opened!!

synopsis: Kenshiro and the others finally reach Cassandra.

title.jp: Villains Need No Tombstones! This is Cassandra in Hell!!

synopsis: Cassandra’s gate opens.

title.jp: The North Star's 2000 Years of Tragedy! I Can Hear Ken-Oh's Footsteps!

synopsis: Kenshiro and Mamiya fight in Cassandra.

title.jp: Century's End With No Tomorrow! Ken, I've Been Waiting For You!

synopsis: Kenshiro’s group heads into prison to reunite with Toki.

title.jp: The Fall of Cassandra! The Myth of the North Star is Rewritten!

synopsis: Toki and Ken are finally reunited.

title.jp: The Death Omen Star Shines! Ken-Oh, Do You Control Even Death!?

synopsis: Kenshiro and the others leave Cassanra behind.

title.jp: Those Who Fear the Reaper! Listen to the Voice of Lin's Fiery Soul!

synopsis: Ken-oh’s Assault Squadron attacks the village where Lin and the others wait.

title.jp: Voices from Hell! Rei, Did You See the Death Omen Star?

synopsis: Lin’s bravery in the face of certain death inspires courage within the villagers.

title.jp: The South Star Waterfowl Fist's Dance of Death! I'll Give My Life for Love!!

synopsis: Rei challenges Raoh, but Raoh’s fighting spirit alone overwhelms him.

title.jp: Explosion of Secret Techniques! Beyond Hatred is the Fate for the Brothers of the North Star

synopsis: Rei tries desperately to stop Kenshiro from challenging Raoh.

title.jp: The Greatest Battle in History. Raoh Vs. Ken! You're the One to Die!!

synopsis: Mamiya tries to save Toki by firing a bowgun at Raoh.

title.jp: 72 Hours to Live! The Death Omen Star Drags Rei In!!

synopsis: Kenshiro and Raoh’s fight comes to a close.

title.jp: Fate Without Tomorrow! And yet, A Woman Believes in Love!!

synopsis: Kenshiro and Rei arrive at Medicine City.

title.jp: Yuda of the South Star Six Sacred Fist! I'm the Most Beautiful!!

synopsis: The man who carved the initials UD into Mamiya’s shoulder was Yuda.

title.jp: The Death Omen Star Looms! Rei! How Cruel Time Passes By!

synopsis: Kenshiro’s group heads for the town of Buldan in pursuit of Yuda.

title.jp: Beloved Mamiiya! The Death Omen Star Lurks Behind the Sparkle in Your Eyes!

synopsis: Rei has only a short time left to live.

title.jp: Rei, Are You On Your Way to Death? A Man is Beautiful Than Ever!!

synopsis: Dedicating the tiny remainder of his life to Mamiya, Rei seeks Yuda’s defeat.

title.jp: Beautiful Warriors, Rei Vs. Yuda! A Man's Passage Needs to Tears!

synopsis: Rei is saved from peril by Kenshiro’s fist.

title.jp: Farewell, Rei! Heroic Legend Will Be Told Throughout the Ages

synopsis: Rei locks himself in a house alone to await his final moments.

title.jp: Supreme Rules in Turbulence! As the South Star Fades, the North Star Appears

synopsis: After seeing Rei through his final moments, Kenshiro begins his journey once again.

title.jp: The Star of Darkness Engulfs the Heavens! Time Evolves Beyond the Deathmatch!

synopsis: Shu is a blind man who wields one of the South Star Six Sacred Fists.

title.jp: Shu of the South Star White Heron Fist! What Will You Witness in the End of the Century?!

synopsis: Souther’s forces abduct children and conscript them for the construction of his Holy Cross Mausoleum.

title.jp: Love on the Battlefield! Must the Time Tear Love Apart!?

synopsis: The Holy Emperor’s forces’ Garzus Squadron, attacks a young resistance member named Jay.

title.jp: I Am Souther, the Holdy Emperor! I Disallow Love and Compassion!

synopsis: Kenshiro hits secret pressure points on Peji and Giji.

title.jp: Young Hero Challenges His Fate! Your Screaming Soul Shall Move the Heavens!

synopsis: Even after hitting the deadly secret pressure point, the “jinchukyoku,” Kenshiro cannot hold his ground against Souther’s overwhelming might.

title.jp: A Bloody Battle, Shu Vs. Souther! Love, Drowned in the Tears of the Star of Benevolence!

synopsis: Upon hearing from Kenshiro that Shiba died to save him.

title.jp: The Bloody Cross Mausoleum! Shu! I'll Catch Your Tears With My Heart!

synopsis: The cries of Shu's soul awaken the gravely injured Kenshiro.

title.jp: Run Kenshiro! Another Comrad is About to Die!

synopsis: Kenshiro reaches the Holy Cross Mausoleum.

title.jp: Clash of the Polar Stars, Ken Vs. Souther! My Star is the Only Protector of Heaven!

synopsis: Kenshiro and Souther face off.

title.jp: Souther, The Despondent Holy Emperor! You Are Weary From Love!

synopsis: Souther puts his pride as Holy Emperor on the line with his undefeated technique.

title.jp: Critical Times of the North Star! Three Brothers of Fate on the Move!

synopsis: Raoh’s fighting spiritual energy surges, and a steely gleam returns to his eyes.

title.jp: The Other Divine Fist of the North Star! Drive Raoh to Oblivion!

synopsis: To gauge his own injuries, Raoh chooses Koryu as his opponent.

title.jp: The Secret of Origin Revealed! The Heaven Prefers Tragedy!

synopsis: Toki and Raoh battle in past and present.

title.jp: Farewell, Toki! A Man Only Cries Once!

synopsis: The curtain of destiny draws to a close over Toki and Raoh.

title.jp: Ryuga of Sirius! I'll Seize the Rainbow in Tempest!

synopsis: A village once ruled by Ken-oh is now ruled by brigands.

title.jp: A Wolf Running in the Horizon! There Lies the End of Love and Hatred!

synopsis: Sirius, a lone star associated with neither the South Star nor the North Star.

title.jp: Forgive Me, My Sister! I Am Destined to Clash with the North Star!

synopsis: Kenshiro visits a town dominated by the Sabat gang.

title.jp: An Iron Fist for the Roaring Wolf! Toki is in Danger!

synopsis: Kenshiro arrives in a village under Ryuga's control.

title.jp: Let the New Age Awaken! The Wolf's Howl Moves the Heaven!

synopsis: After Ryuga abducts Toki, Kenshiro pursues Ryuga to his castle.

title.jp: Shin of the South Star Sacred Fist! Risked Your Life For Love That Never Will!

synopsis: The man who marked the beginning of Kenshiro's fateful journey.

title.jp: Rei of the South Star Waterfowl Fist! Was a Man Who Died For His Friends!

synopsis: Rei, a man of the South Star Waterfowl Fist, an elegant and beautiful art with unparalleled brutality.

title.jp: Yuda of the South Star Crimson Crane Fist! His Beautiful Smile Calls For Tragedy!

synopsis: Yuda, of the Star of Deception and its crimson gleam, deemed himself the most beautiful in the world.

title.jp: Shu of the South Star White Heron Fist! The Heaven Only Bestows Cruel Destinies

synopsis: When Kenshiro was a boy, Shu of the South Star Waterfowl Fist, gave up his own light in exchange for Kenshiro’s life.

title.jp: Holy Emperor Souther!! Your Deep Affection Consumes You In Love!

synopsis: Yuda caused the destruction of the South Star Sacred Fist.

title.jp: Conclusion of Part Four: Raoh Must Die! The Legend Turns to Terror!!

synopsis: Ken-Oh steadily sends his troops forward, expanding his territory.

title.jp: The South Star Strikes Back! The Wind Brigade Protects the Last General of the South Star!!

synopsis: Kenshiro fights the Killer Machine Gren, created by Dabide, one of Ken-Oh’s followers.

title.jp: Preclude to a Deathmatch! The Screams of Hyui of the Wind Echoes in the Heaven!!

synopsis: The Wind Brigade destroys Ken-Oh’s forces in several locations to draw Ken-Oh out.

title.jp: The Burning Crimson Brigade! Shuren Is Drenched In Tears of Flame!!

synopsis: Morgan, the chief of the vanguard forces for Ken-Oh, values cars more than human lives.

title.jp: Five Chariot Stars in Danger! Raoh Has Finally Pierced Through the Flames!!

synopsis: Shuren’s unit faces Ken-Oh’s forces.

title.jp: The Five Chariot Stars Approach Kenshiro! Who Are You, Fudo?!

synopsis: The mysterious Fudo tails Kenshiro and the others.

title.jp: The Crisis is Near! Destiny Awaits at the Capital of the South Star!

synopsis: Kenshiro finds a group of bandits using Ken-Oh’s name.

title.jp: I Am Juza of the Clouds! I Shall Move with the Flow of Time!!

synopsis: Ken-Oh’s pike brigade appears before Kenshiro.

title.jp: The Clouds Remain! The Masked General is Finally Revealed!!

synopsis: Kenshiro and the others are taken to a village run by Dolfi.

title.jp: Juza of the Clouds Resurrects! I Have No Fear for Raoh!!

synopsis: While Kenshiro comes to a bridge checkpoint.

title.jp: Juza Vs. Raoh! An End of the Legend of the Invincible!!

synopsis: Kenshiro and the others set out for the South Star capital.

title.jp: Fudo in Peril!! Hurry, Ken. A Man Must Not Abandon His Friends!!

synopsis: With Kokuoh gone and his mobility cut off, Raoh sends Zaku’s squad at Kenshiro to try to stop him as well.

title.jp: Treacherous Quicksand! Will the Hand of Salvation Reach Fudo?

synopsis: Fudo dives into a bottomless quicksand pit to save his children.

title.jp: Juza Falls! I'll Give My Life to Protect the Woman I Love

synopsis: For the last South Star general, Juza fights Ken-Oh again.

title.jp: Farewell Yuria! A Strong Man Will Not Speak of Love, Even in Death!!

synopsis: Having learned who the last general is, Kenshiro dispatches one of Ken-Oh’s squads.

title.jp: The Capital of the South Star Trembles! The Two Brothers of the North Star Finally Arrive!!

synopsis: Raoh destroyed the Divine Fist of the North Star’s 2,000 years of history.

title.jp: Sadness of the Five Chariot Stars! Love and Destiny Looms Over the Woman!!

synopsis: The last South Star general, who holds the key to conquering the century’s end, is Yuria.

title.jp: The Ultimate Secret Technique, Unconscious Transmigration! Raoh, I've Got You Now!!

synopsis: Kenshiro believes that Yuria will die unless he defeats Raoh.

title.jp: Is It the End of Raoh and His Ambitions? The Heaven Hesitates Once Again!!

synopsis: Raoh’s legs buckle with fear under Kenshiro’s Divine Fist of the North Star Ultimate Secret Technique.

title.jp: Raoh, the Confused Giant! I Don't Believe in Love!!

synopsis: Kenshiro, with his eyes wounded and his light stolen, sets out into the wasteland after Ken-Oh.

title.jp: A Challenge From the Devil! Fudo, Be the Demon for Those You Love!!

synopsis: Fudo was once called a demon, and in his youth Raoh feared him.

title.jp: Fudo, the Gentle Warrior! His Tears Awaken a Fiery Soul!!

synopsis: Raoh and Fudo fight furiously, but the battle ends with Raoh at the advantage.

title.jp: Protect the Merciful Mother of the South Star! Even If It's the End of the Five Chariots!!

synopsis: The Five Chariot Stars fall before Raoh.

title.jp: Raoh, Shaken by a Nightmare! Yuria, You Are the Only One!!

synopsis: News of Ken-Oh’s defeat causes upheaval in his troops.

title.jp: Showdown at the North Star Mind and Body Training Ground! No One Can Stop Them Now!!

synopsis: Kenshiro and Raoh face off at the most holy of training grounds in the 2,000 year history of the North Star.

title.jp: Farewell, the Brothers of the North Star! They're Beyond Love and Sorrow!

synopsis: Raoh unleashes a fierce fighting spirit.

title.jp: Now Revealed! The 2000 Year History of the North Star!

synopsis: Kenshiro and Yuria first met at The North Star Mind and Body Training Ground.

title.jp: The Past is Gone. The Dawn of the New Age!!

synopsis: Bat is now a brave young man, and Lin has grown into a beautiful woman.
